response.message: Congratulations, Robert! And it's good to finally get a visible picture of you! :-)
You're letting a little girl be on your staff? Is this a joke?
Yeah, I don't know who that dude is in the picture with Robert.
Congratulations, Robert!  By the way, Stack Overflow Valued Associate #00005.5 has your smile. :D
What is a community coordinator exactly?
The current President of the United States of America was once a community coordinator. No pressure.

Congratulations, Robert! Jeff, good idea hiring from the community - this really illustrates what makes Stack Overflow so excellent. Keep up the great work. Here's to the future!

captcha: lingo governing

Thank you for the kind words. 

@Juan Manuel: After reading this announcement, I was thinking about dropping the title "Community Coordinator," and instead using "CITY PLANNER."
Are you serious ? This guy is wearing a Tie. He cannot be a real programmer..;-)

Robert's a cutie and his dad aint bad too. :)

Great work Robert - always good to see an addition to the team.
Nice news. Good luck Robert! I'm sure you'll be able to improve SO even beyond the current high level.

Congrats and good luck.

I also like the idea of hiring within the community.  I guess you get a free pass on not using SO careers since it's not really a programmer position.
Oh, we used careers -- I required that Robert have a CV on it before proceeding :)

"What is a community coordinator exactly?"

It means he answers the whinging emails from people who can't/won't use meta :)
